title: Square Neck Floral Dress
description:
French Blue Puff Sleeve Mini Dress

Turn heads in our French Blue Puff Sleeve Mini Dress, where classic charm meets modern romance. This
flattering mini dress features a structured square neckline and voluminous puff sleeves that bring a soft,
feminine edge to your look. The front tie detail adds a touch of playful elegance, while the fitted bodice and
flared hem create a beautifully balanced silhouette.

title: Bodycon Mermaid Gown
description:
This floral mini dress is giving soft girl vibes with a clean square neckline and classic blue-on-white print. The A-line fit
flatters every shape and feels breezy for those days you wanna look cute without trying too hard.

Lightweight and flowy, this floral mini dress is perfect for chill brunches, sunny strolls, or just feeling pretty on a random
Tuesday.


ABOUT THE PRODUCT

Country of Origin

Proudly Made in India

Brand

1 piece






WHY THIS PRODUCT?

A-line shape gives that easy twirl

Blue floral print = timeless summer aesthetic

Soft, breathable fabric

Evening Look: Style with kitten heels and a cute baguette bag

title: Chic Back Bow Tiered Dress
description:
We are introducing the A-Line Pleated High Waisted Summer Skirt in Chocolate Brown, a flattering everyday staple made for
warm-weather dressing. Designed with crisp pleats and a clean high-rise fit, this high waisted summer skirt nails the balance
between structured and breezy.

The cotton-blend fabric keeps it light and breathable while holding its shape. It is perfect for everything from slow brunches to
street-style strolls.

> Note: Styling accessories shown in the images, such as belts, are for inspiration only and are not included with the product.


ABOUT THE PRODUCT

Country of Origin

Proudly Made In India

Brand

Littlebox India (LBI)

Pack Contains

1 Piece



 * Color: Chocolate Brown
 * Length: Mini
 * Stitch: Ready to wear
 * Fabric: 70% Cotton, 30% Polyester
 * Lining: NA
 * Occasion: Casual, Summer Days, Day Out
 * Transparency: Opaque
 * Fit Type: A-line Fit
 * Pattern Type: Solid
 * Hemline: Pleated
 * Care Instructions: Handwash, Machine Wash


WHY THIS PRODUCT?

 * High waisted summer skirt that flatters every shape and adds easy movement
 * Cotton-blend keeps it breathable and wearable all day long
 * Pleated design brings dimension and structure without the bulk
 * Chocolate brown is a soft neutral that pairs with anything


HOW TO STYLE?

 * Easy Brunch Fit: Pair this high waisted summer skirt with a ruched top and wedges
 * Laidback Street Style: Pair with a ribbed crop top, white sneakers, and a mini backpack

title: Men Polo Collar T-shirt
description:
We’re introducing the Acubi Style Pink Baggy Womens Cargo In Pink. These women cargo pants bring playful energy to utilitarian
fashion. Designed with statement side pockets and a relaxed silhouette, they add the perfect edge to your everyday or festival
fits.

Crafted for comfort with an eye-catching hue, this pink pair levels up your bold streetwear game. Say hello to your new go-to
women cargo.


ABOUT THE PRODUCT

Country of Origin

Proudly Made In India

Brand

Littlebox India (LBI)

Pack Contains

1 Pair




WHY THIS PRODUCT?

 * Eye-catching pink shade with strong Y2K vibes
 * Roomy cargo pockets to stash your essentials
 * Baggy fit that’s breathable and trendy


HOW TO STYLE

 * Day Look: Pair your women cargo with a white halter top and chunky boots
 * Evening Look: Layer with an oversized cropped hoodie and hoops

title: Slim Fit Suit Set In Black
description:
We’re introducing the Acubi Style Tilted Pockets Baggy Womens Cargo In Black. These women cargo pants flip the script on classic
utility with their edgy slant-pocket detailing and ultra-loose fit. If Y2K streetwear had a VIP section, this piece would be on
the guest list.

The matte black base and contrast stitch lines make these women cargo pants a confident choice for bold dressing. Built for
movement, attitude, and everyday statement style.

title: Men's Formal Shirt
description:
Introducing our Aesthetic Sweetheart Neck Blouse & High Waisted Wide Leg Pants Set In Blue.
This blouse and pants set serves up effortless drama with puffed sleeves and a sculpted neckline. The structured crop top pairs
seamlessly with breezy wide-leg trousers, making your silhouette pop while keeping you comfy.

Whether you’re heading out for brunch or planning a chill weekend hang, this blouse and pants duo keeps you style-ready with
minimal effort.

Brand

WHY THIS PRODUCT

title: Vintage Retro Maroon Dress
description:
We are introducing the Angular Bows Asymmetric Gathered Mid-Tier Panel Midi Skirt In Black, a stylish and fun choice for parties,
dinners, or any day you want to try something different. This long midi skirt has soft gathers, a loose fit, and cute bow details
that give it a sweet and girly look. Made from light polyester fabric, it feels comfy and flows nicely when you move. If you like
outfits that stand out, this long midi skirt is a great pick.


ABOUT THE PRODUCT



Country of Origin

Proudly Made in India

Brand

Littlebox India (LBI)

Pack Contains

1 piece



 * Color: Black
 * Length: Midi
 * Stitch: Ready to wear
 * Fabric: 100% Polyester
 * Lining: NA
 * Occasion: Party, Dinner, Semi-Formal
 * Transparency: Opaque
 * Fit Type: Relaxed Fit
 * Pattern Type: Solid with Bow Detail
 * Hemline: Flowy, Asymmetric Panel
 * Care Instructions: Hand wash and Machine Wash


WHY THIS PRODUCT?

 * Flowy long midi skirt with bow details
   
 * Lightweight and comfortable to wear
   
 * Looks dressy but feels easy


HOW TO STYLE?

Casual Wear : Pair this long midi skirt with a tucked-in tee and sandals

Party Wear : Style it with a puff sleeve blouse, heels, and a cute clutch

description:

title: Floral Wrap V-Neck Dress
description:
Introducing our Asymmetrical Cold Shoulder Ruffle Trim Ruched Tube Top In Black. This ruched tube top serves main character energy
with cascading ruffles and a sculpted silhouette. From the strapless neckline to the dramatic drape, it’s built to turn heads
wherever you go.

Whether you're out for late-night plans or channeling Y2K vibes at a house party, this ruched tube top is your ultimate
drama-ready fit.


ABOUT THE PRODUCT

Country of Origin Proudly Made In India Brand Littlebox India (LBI) Pack Contains 1 Piece


WHY THIS PRODUCT

 * Statement ruffle trim with dramatic asymmetrical flair
 * Stretch ruched fit that hugs in all the right places
 * Perfect for elevated party looks or edgy casual vibes


HOW TO STYLE

 * Day Look: Pair with straight-leg jeans and platform sandals
 * Evening Look: Match with leather pants and layered chains

title: Black & White Maxi Dress
description:
Introducing our Asymmetrical Floral Print Ruched Strapless Top. This ruched strapless top is the definition of flirty meets
elevated. The asymmetric hem and side drawstring add playful edge, while the delicate yellow floral print softens the vibe. With a
body-hugging fit and breezy fabric, it’s made for when you want to show up cute with zero effort.

Whether you’re dressing for a casual outing or something a bit more elevated, this ruched strapless top is your go-to for an
effortlessly put-together vibe.


ABOUT THE PRODUCT

Country of Origin

Proudly Made In India

Brand

Littlebox India (LBI)

Pack Contains

1 Piece




WHY THIS PRODUCT

 * Eye-catching floral print in summer-friendly tones
 * Adjustable drawstring ruching for a cinched look
 * No straps, no stress—just a secure, sculpted fit


HOW TO STYLE

title: Floral Print Bodycon Dress
description:
Introducing our Asymmetrical Floral Ruched Strapless Top In Brown. This strapless top brings sculpted energy and bold shape in one
sleek piece. Designed with an angled hemline and side ruching, it contours your figure while adding a modern edge. The
stretch-blend fabric keeps it snug and comfortable, while the warm brown tone makes it endlessly pairable.

Whether you're layering it or making it your main piece, this strapless top brings effortless impact to any fit.


ABOUT THE PRODUCT

Country of Origin Proudly Made In India Brand Littlebox India (LBI) Pack Contains 1 Piece





WHY THIS PRODUCT

 * Ruched detailing enhances curves and adds texture
 * Asymmetrical cut offers a bold, flattering silhouette
 * Stretch fabric keeps the fit comfortable and flexible


HOW TO STYLE

 * Evening Look: Style with a bodycon midi skirt and heels
